net.sf.sprockets.gms.location

Class Locations

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.sprockets.gms.location.Locations

  • public class Locations
extends Object
    Utility methods for working with Locations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GoogleApiClient client(Context context)
      Get a connected client for LocationServices.
      static int requestCurrent(Context context, int priority, LocationListener listener)
      Get the current location with the priority and send it to the listener.
      static int requestCurrent(Context context, LocationListener listener)
      Get the current coarse location and send it to the listener.
      static int requestLast(Context context, LocationListener listener)
      Get the best most recent location or, if none are available, the current coarse location and send it to the listener.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • client

        public static GoogleApiClient client(Context context)
        Get a connected client for LocationServices. Must not be called on the UI thread.
        Returns:
        null if connecting fails
        Since:
        2.4.0

      • requestLast

        public static int requestLast(Context context,
              LocationListener listener)
        Get the best most recent location or, if none are available, the current coarse location and send it to the listener.
        Returns:
        SUCCESS if Google Play services is available and an attempt will be made to get the location and send it to the listener

      • requestCurrent

        public static int requestCurrent(Context context,
                 LocationListener listener)
        Get the current coarse location and send it to the listener.
        Returns:
        SUCCESS if Google Play services is available and an attempt will be made to get the location and send it to the listener

      • requestCurrent

        public static int requestCurrent(Context context,
                 int priority,
                 LocationListener listener)
        Get the current location with the priority and send it to the listener.
        Parameters:
        priority - must be one of the LocationRequest PRIORITY constants
        Returns:
        SUCCESS if Google Play services is available and an attempt will be made to get the location and send it to the listener
